brains.name: Personal Life Brain
brains.description: Personal life, routines, health, errands, relationships. Calendar access is optional and configured via env vars (see README).

brains.name: Job Application Brain (optional)
brains.description: Job search pipeline, applications, tracking, follow-ups (optional module)

nexus.name: Nexus (Orchestrator)
nexus.description: Main system interface and command routing
